summary: SummaryHighlightsClean Ingredientsma:nyo Deep Clean Cleansing Balm is formulated with a buttery soft texture, it effectively breaks down stubborn makeup and melts away dirt and blackheads without leaving the skin feeling taut and dry.
details: DetailsFeaturesEnclosed spatula to allow hygenic cleansing experience and use the appropriate amount of balm.One-step deep cleansing with Revercella Technology that allows for better attraction of dirt, grime to cleanse all traces of sunscreen, waterproof makeup, foundation, and other impurities of the day.Formulated with non-irritating, hypoallergenic ingredients and it is suitalbe for all skin types including sensitive and oily skin.Key IngredientsHyaluronic acid - Replenishes moisture to clarified pores to restore moisturized and make skin glow.Allantoin - Moisturizes the skin, alleviates itchiness, promotes the healing of minor injuries, and enhances the overall texture and appearance of the skin.Panthenol - Helps to soften and smoothen the skin, and aids in the repair of damaged skin.Formulated WithoutFragranceSiliconParabenItem 2626988How To UseUse the spatula to scoop out a suitable amount.Gently massage the balm in circular motions onto dry skin, dissolving makeup, dirt and other residues.Moisten with water to emulsify, then continue massaging.Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.IngredientsEthylhexyl Palmitate, Sorbeth-30 Tetraoleate, Isododecane, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Synthetic Wax, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Squalane, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Juglans Regia (Walnut) Seed Oil, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil, Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Panthenol, Glycerin, Ulmus Davidiana Root Extract, Pueraria Lobata Root Extract, Pinus Palustris Leaf Extract, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primose) Flower Extract, Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Papain, Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, Allantoin, Niacinamide, Ascorbic Acid, Tocopherol, Malus Domestica Fruit Extract, Beta Vulgaris (Beet) Root Extract, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract, Ficus Carica (Fig) Fruit Extract, Water(Aqua), Ceramide NP, Butylene Glycol, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Phytosphingosine, Fragrance, 1,2-Hexanediol, Silica Dimethyl Silylate.
how_to_use: Use the spatula to scoop out a suitable amount.Gently massage the balm in circular motions onto dry skin, dissolving makeup, dirt and other residues.Moisten with water to emulsify, then continue massaging.Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Love this cleansing balm. It deeps cleans without stripping and leaves your skin moisturized and soft afterwards. I haven't smelled any scent with this product. The only thing is dont like is when i used it to take off waterproof mascara and eyeliner it burned bad, so i will just use to take off makeup on my face instead. Overall love this product.

reviews.headline: Not fragrance free
reviews.comments: I purchased this because it was under the 'Fragrance Free' filter, but I noticed a strong floral fragrance when I used it. It in fact does have 'fragranve' listed as an ingredient, so im not surr why it was listed as a fragrsnce free product. It also isnt as moisturizing and emulsifying as other balms I've tried. Unfortunately I'll have to return it.

reviews.headline: LOVE
reviews.comments: I love this cleansing balm. I was using another popular one (green container) and found it to be too gritty for my sensitive skin. I have rosacea and this doesn't irritate my skin AT all. It takes all of my foundation off and leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth. I enjoy the texture and find it doesn't have any strong scent (a huge pro for me). Will definitely keep using!

reviews.headline: Love it !
reviews.comments: I have. Dry snetivie skin.  I often have eszcema on my cheeks. This product is very gentle on the face. And Removed all the make up and dirt off my face .

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: So far so good!  Make up melts off.  I only gave it 4 stars because it takes a lot more "oomph" to get waterproof mascara off.  There is a slight fragrance so I wouldnt use if youre sensitive to that.   But it works really well and I love it so far!

reviews.headline: Great balm
reviews.comments: I decided to give this a try because it said deep cleaning and it did not disappoint.  a little goes a long way. it took all my.make up off and left my skin feeling soft.

reviews.headline: Great Makeup Remover Balm
reviews.comments: Ive been using this brand makeup removing balm for a few months now and this balm is awesome. I had been using the big name (blue) brand makeup balm and decided to give this one a try. The size of the jar is larger and you get a good amount of product. I like that it comes with a spoon to remove the balm out. It does a greatvjob of removing all makeup even waterproof. It is scent free and vegan. It is more expensive than the drugstore brand and i did get mine free in exchange for a review on another site but its a great makeup remover and I would buy it again.
